lines.text: If Woody had gone right to the police, this would never have happened.
The true-life story you are about to see was lifted from the files of the Bunco Squad. We call it the Case of the Gullible Woodpecker.

[discovering Buzz's phony treasure map]
A buried treasure? Wow!

[voiceover]
A person obsessed with greed is easy prey for the confidence man.
[Buzz is hastily leaving Cataloony Island without Woody, who is running after him]

[following behind]
If Woody had gone right to the police...
